extendedInfo.description: See Santa fly around your current location on map. Let your kids write to Santa and receive responses. Santa will fly closer and closer to your place as the Christmas Eve comes closer. Includes a countdown to Christmas.

reviews.title: TWO THUMBS UP!!!
reviews.comment: This app is SO cute. Very well done... Download it asap. =o)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: HORRIBLE apt, wish I could have given a neg star!Santa wrote back to my 5 yo son that he didn\'t need all the toys he asked for, which was 4 items WTF?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Booo! Stop working right when I needed it now I will never see santa :( bad times
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Horrible cuz said he was in south America when it was December 6 my little SIS was so disappointed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nothing special
reviews.comment: We tried to ask Santa how old his reindeer are and we got back some response that was a little rude and totally confusing. I\'m uninstalling now...
reviews.author: Susan Smith

reviews.title: Good when it loads
reviews.comment: When the app loads its really good and the kids are amazed. But that is when it actually finds your location!!!
reviews.author: Anne-marie Kingshott

reviews.title: My son is amazed
reviews.comment: My 9 year old wrote his letter to Santa and you should have seen his face when Santa wrote back. Even more amazing...the response could have been written by me. Louis will get his gifts but he has to concentrate on his studies. I\'ve been giving that lecture for months. LOL. Love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible...
reviews.comment: Would be a minus 5 stars. Douchebags telling my three year old that he doesn\'t deserve what he asked for.  Get rid of this app.  Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: How did this app get nearly 4*it cant track my location and doesn\'t even open or do anything! My nephew though i was stupid when i tried it out!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome! Sometimes his email doesn\'t make sense with the mail you send. Should have certian key words for a certain email back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazingly amazing!
reviews.comment: Keeps both me and my 4 year old bro staring at screen! He cant read yet but when i told him \"santa\" wrote him a letter he nearly broke my phone trying to read it himself! Greatest app for multiple ages but it could be a little more christmasy dontcha think?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: This app does nothing.failed to work everytime.can\'t see the point.my children where not happy and thought Santa had forgotten them
reviews.author: david saunders

reviews.comment: Said santa was in my town at 5:30 pm. I couldn\'t show my son that! Crap. Be gone with you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Do NOT download this app, HIDEOUS!!
reviews.comment: This is the worst Santa app I have EVER seen, developers WHAT WERE YOU THINKING?!! The message replies are as far from what a kid wants to read from Santa as it gets \"oh god I lost my bag of gifts.....\"??!!! You utter retards!! Android market are a bit thick too for recommending it WTF?!! Most, like me, will download out of curiosity...as expected the boneheads who rated this higher than a 1 are clearly as retarded as the developers or members of their families.  HIDEOUS APP!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The replies from Santa are horrible! Telling children he lost his bag of toys? That the malls are crowded? Horrible! Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can\'t show my little girl this one because it says he is already delivering presents in my city and it is only 2:00 in the afternoon!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is good for lil kids
reviews.comment: Awsome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: App Does nothing, the letters to santa is cool but hard to open letter and no notice saying he replied. O well merry christmas anyway
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Peace of CRAP
reviews.comment: This game sucks... I sent a bunch of random letters and he wrote back \" I hope I dont forget, So remind me on the 24th\" tonight is the 24th ... Geez atleast make it seem real!!!
reviews.author: Ivy Peoples

reviews.comment: Forced closed. Said Santa was in my city (its 9:20 pm) then forced closed, opened again and he was in ny. Opened again and he was back in my city.
reviews.author: A Google User
